Im in that same spot bro i will shoot up anything that will fit in a needle i just had a relapse yesterday and am feeling not only the ill effects off the comedown but the intense obsession of the ritual of injection kills me inside trying to get into rehab (again) and try to address these compulsions, but unfortunately despite all my ideas on getting clean, im truly clueless that however doesnt mean were hopeless, that just suggests to me to follow the guidance of those who have recovered

dude im also addicted to IV Heroin, Cocaine, Meth, and all of the above started when i was 17 and i was the only one who slammed in my school(not to sound prideful but just to relate to you) and everyone else smokes or snorts around me as well but back to addiction, i understand the needle fixation is just as strong as the dope itself im struggling to commit myself to recovery, but trying to enter rehab (again) im not the guy to ask about how to get clean, but what i can say is follow the suggestions of those who have succeeded in recovery and no half measures

i found god alright

bro (i call everyone that so dont be offended) i deal with that all the fucking time, i cant stand going another minute without cutting or getting high. I can relate to your feelings, especially since suicide is out of the question(at least now). i hold on to the hope that i can turn my life around, but it aint gonna happen as long as im fucked up. Cos i believe (at least for me) that no one actually wants to die, but seek a way out of pain. As kids we grew up with hopes, dreams, and optimism. Hold on to that bro. We gotta take baby steps to improve ourselves, but gotta put the footwork in. GOD(Good Orderly Direction) bless you.
